edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.morph

Class StructuringElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.morph.StructuringElement

  • public class StructuringElement
extends Object
    This class represents a structuring element for use in morphological image processing.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StructuringElement(ImageCoordinate size)
      Constructs a new StructuingElement from and ImageCoordinate specifying its size in each dimension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StructuringElement

        public StructuringElement(ImageCoordinate size)
        Constructs a new StructuingElement from and ImageCoordinate specifying its size in each dimension.

        All dimensions must have odd size, but this is not checked. For dimensions over which you do not wish to apply the morphological operation, specify size 1.

        Parameters:
        size - an ImageCoordinate containing the sizes of each dimension.

    • Method Detail

      • boxImageToElement

        public void boxImageToElement(ImageCoordinate currentPosition,
                     Image toBeBoxed)
        Sets the box of interest in an Image to be the size of the structuring element surrounding a specified position in that image.
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - The position around which the box will be centered.
        toBeBoxed - The Image that will be boxed.

      • get

        public float get(ImageCoordinate strelCoord)
        Gets the value of the StructuringElement at a location specified in the coordinates of the StructuringElement.
        Parameters:
        strelCoord - The coordinate from which to retrieve the value.
        Returns:
        The value of the StructuringElement at that point.

      • get

        public float get(ImageCoordinate strelCenterImageCoord,
        ImageCoordinate imageCoord)
        Gets the value of the StructuringElement at a location in the coordinates of an Image.
        Parameters:
        strelCenterImageCoord - The coordinate in the image where the structuring element is centered.
        imageCoord - The corresponding coordinate in the image from which to retrieve the value of the structuring element.
        Returns:
        The value of the StructuringElement at that point.

      • setAll

        public void setAll(float value)
        Sets the value at every location in a StructuringElement to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to which to set the StructuringElement.

      • set

        public void set(ImageCoordinate strelCenterImageCoord,
       ImageCoordinate imageCoord,
       float value)
        Sets the value of the StructuringElement at a location in the coordinates of an Image.
        Parameters:
        strelCenterImageCoord - The coordinate in the image where the structuring element is centered.
        imageCoord - The corresponding coordinate in the image where the value of the structuring element will be set.
        value - The value to which to set the structuring element.

      • set

        public void set(ImageCoordinate strelCoord,
       float value)
        Sets the value of the StructuringElement at a location specified in the coordinates of the StructuringElement.
        Parameters:
        strelCoord - The coordinate at which to set the value.
        value - The value to which to set the structuring element.
